subject: Application for {position}
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I would like to apply for the "{position} Position" under your kind control. My resume is attached for your review and I would appreciate the opportunity to discuss with you personally how I can best serve your organization.

Please accept my resume in consideration for this position and I would be grateful if you contact me regarding any further steps. You may contact me any time via email or WhatsApp No: (+65) 81374876.

Thank you for your time and consideration

Yours sincerely,

Chit Su Myat Noe @ Cassy
